# The `DwarfEmitterImpl` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class emits DWARF data to the output stream. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::dwarf_linker::parallel::DwarfEmitterImpl</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class emits DWARF data to the output stream.

It emits already generated section data and specific data, which could not be generated by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/compileunit">CompileUnit</a>.

Definition at line 48 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dwarfemitterimpl-h">DWARFEmitterImpl.h</a>.
